    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chana’s Anguish and Triumph 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chana?s Qual und Triumph 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angoisse et triomphe 2 de Chana?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anguish de Chana?s e triunfo 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anguish di Chana?s e trionfo 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγχος και θρίαμβος 2 Chana?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Angustia y triunfo 2 de Chana?s</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this MI unit, learners study and discuss the prayer of Chana. They then write their own prayer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prayer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tefila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser MI Maßeinheit studieren Anfänger und 
behandeln das Gebet von Chana. Sie schreiben dann ihr eigenes 
Gebet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette unité de MI, les étudiants étudient 
et discutent la prière de Chana. Ils écrivent alors leur 
propre prière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta unidade do MI, os learners estudam e discutem
o prayer de Chana. Escrevem então seu próprio prayer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa unità di MI, i principianti studiano e 
discutono la preghiera di Chana. Allora scrivono la loro propria
preghiera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την MI μονάδα, οι αρχάριοι μελετούν και 
συζητούν την προσευχή Chana. Γράφουν έπειτα την προσευχή
τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta unidad del MI, los principiantes estudian y
discuten el rezo de Chana. Entonces escriben su propio rezo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
